object.name: LinkPreviewOptions
object.description: Describes the options used for link preview generation.
object.html_description: Describes the options used for link preview generation.
object.rst_description: Describes the options used for link preview generation.

annotations.description: True, if the link preview is disabled
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the link preview is disabled
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the link preview is disabled
annotations.name: is_disabled

annotations.description: URL to use for the link preview. If empty, then the first URL found in the message text will be used
annotations.html_description: Optional. URL to use for the link preview. If empty, then the first URL found in the message text will be used
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. URL to use for the link preview. If empty, then the first URL found in the message text will be used
annotations.name: url

annotations.description: True, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be shrunk; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be shrunk; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be shrunk; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.name: prefer_small_media

annotations.description: True, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be enlarged; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be enlarged; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the media in the link preview is supposed to be enlarged; ignored if the URL isn't explicitly specified or media size change isn't supported for the preview
annotations.name: prefer_large_media

annotations.description: True, if the link preview must be shown above the message text; otherwise, the link preview will be shown below the message text
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the link preview must be shown above the message text; otherwise, the link preview will be shown below the message text
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the link preview must be shown above the message text; otherwise, the link preview will be shown below the message text
annotations.name: show_above_text
